text:
When Kim Darroch's comments about the Trump administration were leaked in 2019, the British ambassador to the U.S. became persona non grata overnight. He resigned days later.

name: NPR
text:
A COVID-19 vaccine may only be about 50% effective. That means 50 out of 100 people who get the vaccine could still end up getting infected.

Experts say that could still help end the pandemic â€” if enough people get vaccinated. https://t.co/DFvKopsbrJ

text:

So, advocates are trying to answer their questions now.

name: NPR
text: AstraZeneca has resumed its COVID-19 vaccine trials in the U.K. The drugmaker paused them worldwide after a U.K. participant developed a neurological illness but now says a safety review is complete. https://t.co/80NzvmG0pt
